009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line;
010
011import java.util.Random;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014
015
016public class LineSampler {
017        
018        private final Random rg;
019        
020        private final Pnt2d p1, p2;
021        
022        public LineSampler(Pnt2d p1, Pnt2d p2) {
023                this.p1 = p1;
024                this.p2 = p2;
025                this.rg = new Random();
026        }
027        
028        public LineSampler(Pnt2d p1, Pnt2d p2, long seed) {
029                this.p1 = p1;
030                this.p2 = p2;
031                this.rg = new Random(seed);
032        }
033        
034        public Pnt2d[] getPoints(int n, double sigma) {
035                double dx = p2.getX() - p1.getX();
036                double dy = p2.getY() - p1.getY();
037                
038                Pnt2d[] pts = new Pnt2d[n];
039                
040                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
041                        double x = p1.getX() + dx * i / n + rg.nextGaussian() * sigma;
042                        double y = p1.getY() + dy * i / n + rg.nextGaussian() * sigma;
043                        pts[i] = Pnt2d.from(x, y);
044                }
045                
046                return pts;
047        }
048
049}
